<Heading as={"h1"} className={"openapi__heading"} children={"Listar despliegues"} />

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/projects/{project_id}/list_deployments"} context={"endpoint"} />

Lista los despliegues de un proyecto.

<Heading id={"request"} as={"h2"} className={"openapi-tabs__heading"} children={"Solicitud"} />

<ParamsDetails parameters={[{"name":"project_id","in":"path","description":"ID del proyecto","required":true,"schema":{"type":"integer","format":"int64","minimum":0,"title":"ProjectId"}}]} />

<RequestSchema title={"Cuerpo"} body={undefined} />

<StatusCodes id={undefined} label={undefined} responses={{"200":{"description":"","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","required":["name","createTime","deploymentType","projectId"],"properties":{"createTime":{"type":"integer","format":"int64","description":"Marca de tiempo en milisegundos del momento en que se creó este despliegue."},"deploymentType":{"description":"Indica si se trata de un despliegue de desarrollo \"dev\" o de producción \"prod\".\n","type":"string","enum":["dev","prod","preview"],"title":"DeploymentType"},"name":{"type":"string","description":"El identificador legible para este despliegue, algo como\nplayful-otter-123."},"previewIdentifier":{"oneOf":[{"type":"null"},{"description":"Identificador del despliegue de vista previa, si se trata de un despliegue de vista previa.","type":"string","title":"PreviewDeploymentIdentifier"}]},"projectId":{"type":"integer","format":"int64","minimum":0,"title":"ProjectId","description":"El proyecto al que pertenece este despliegue."}},"title":"PlatformDeploymentResponse"}}}}}}} />
